item.title: AI, AGI, and the Future: Insights from the Last Two Weeks
item.description: I’m going to share some incredible insights I’ve come across in the past two weeks. The world is moving at an accelerated speedâ€”something you might not fully notice from Bangladesh. So let me give you a snapshot of what’s happening.
